analyzed: snigdha vaiḍūrya saṃkāśaḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇaḥ

tridaśārir munīndraghno daśaśīrṣa ivādrirāṭ // Ram_3,33.9 //
analyzed: tridaśa ariḥ muni indra ghnaḥ daśa śīrṣaḥ iva

analyzed: kāmagam ratham āsthāya śuśubhe rākṣasa adhipaḥ

analyzed: ājaiḥ vaikhānasaiḥ māṣaiḥ vālakhilyaiḥ marīcipaiḥ

original: tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ gṛdhrarākṣasayos tadā /
analyzed: tat babhūva adbhutam yuddham gṛdhra rākṣasayoḥ tadā

original: sapakṣayor mālyavator mahāparvatayor iva // Ram_3,49.4 //
analyzed: sapakṣayoḥ mālyavatoḥ mahā parvatayoḥ iva

original: tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ /
analyzed: tatas nālīka nārācaiḥ tīkṣṇa agraiḥ ca vikarṇibhiḥ

original: abhyavarṣan mahāghorair gṛdhrarājaṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,49.5 //
analyzed: abhyavarṣat mahā ghoraiḥ gṛdhra rājam mahā balaḥ

original: sa tāni śarajālāni gṛdhraḥ pattraratheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: sa tāni śara jālāni gṛdhraḥ pattraratha īśvaraḥ

original: jaṭāyuḥ pratijagrāha rāvaṇāstrāṇi saṃyuge // Ram_3,49.6 //
analyzed: jaṭāyuḥ pratijagrāha rāvaṇa astrāṇi saṃyuge

original: tasya tīkṣṇanakhābhyāṃ tu caraṇābhyāṃ mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: tasya tīkṣṇa nakhābhyām tu caraṇābhyām mahā balaḥ

original: cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān patagasattamaḥ // Ram_3,49.7 //
analyzed: cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān pataga sattamaḥ

original: atha krodhād daśagrīvo jagrāha daśamārgaṇān /
analyzed: atha krodhāt daśagrīvaḥ jagrāha daśa mārgaṇān

original: mṛtyudaṇḍanibhān ghorāñ śatrumardanakāṅkṣayā // Ram_3,49.8 //
analyzed: mṛtyu daṇḍa nibhān ghorām śatru mardana kāṅkṣayā

original: sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ /
analyzed: sa taiḥ bāṇaiḥ mahā vīryaḥ pūrṇa muktaiḥ a jihma gaiḥ

original: bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // Ram_3,49.9 //
analyzed: bibheda niśitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ gṛdhram ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ

original: sa rākṣasarathe paśyañ jānakīṃ bāṣpalocanām /
analyzed: sa rākṣasa rathe paśyam jānakīm bāṣpa locanām

original: acintayitvā bāṇāṃs tān rākṣasaṃ samabhidravat // Ram_3,49.10 //
analyzed: a cintayitvā bāṇān tān rākṣasam samabhidravat

original: tato 'sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muktāmaṇivibhūṣitam /
analyzed: tatas sya sa śaram cāpam muktā maṇi vibhūṣitam

original: caraṇābhyāṃ mahātejā babhañja patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,49.11 //
analyzed: caraṇābhyām mahā tejāḥ babhañja pataga īśvaraḥ

original: tac cāgnisadṛśaṃ dīptaṃ rāvaṇasya śarāvaram /
analyzed: tat ca agni sadṛśam dīptam rāvaṇasya śarāvaram

original: pakṣābhyāṃ ca mahātejā vyadhunot patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,49.12 //
analyzed: pakṣābhyām ca mahā tejāḥ vyadhunot pataga īśvaraḥ

original: kāñcanoraśchadān divyān piśācavadanān kharān /
analyzed: kāñcana uraśchadān divyān piśāca vadanān kharān

original: tāṃś cāsya javasampannāñ jaghāna samare balī // Ram_3,49.13 //
analyzed: tān ca asya java sampannām jaghāna samare balī

original: varaṃ triveṇusampannaṃ kāmagaṃ pāvakārciṣam /
analyzed: varam triveṇu sampannam kāma gam

original: maṇihemavicitrāṅgaṃ babhañja ca mahāratham /
analyzed: maṇi hema vicitra aṅgam babhañja ca mahā ratham

original: pūrṇacandrapratīkāśaṃ chattraṃ ca vyajanaiḥ saha // Ram_3,49.14 //
analyzed: pūrṇa candra pratīkāśam chattram ca vyajanaiḥ saha

original: sa bhagnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ /
analyzed: sa bhagna dhanvā virathaḥ hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ

original: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.15 //
analyzed: aṅkena ādāya vaidehīm papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhūmau rāvaṇaṃ bhagnavāhanam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā nipatitam bhūmau rāvaṇam bhagna vāhanam

original: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan // Ram_3,49.16 //
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti bhūtāni gṛdhra rājam apūjayan

original: pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam /
analyzed: pariśrāntam tu tam dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣi yūthapam

original: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.17 //
analyzed: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭaḥ maithilīm gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ

original: taṃ prahṛṣṭaṃ nidhāyāṅke gacchantaṃ janakātmajām /
analyzed: tam prahṛṣṭam nidhāya aṅke gacchantam janakātmajām

original: gṛdhrarājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,49.18 //
analyzed: gṛdhra rājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyuḥ idam abravīt

original: vajrasaṃsparśabāṇasya bhāryāṃ rāmasya rāvaṇa /
analyzed: vajra saṃsparśa bāṇasya bhāryām rāmasya rāvaṇa

original: alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām // Ram_3,49.19 //
analyzed: alpabuddhe harasi enām vadhāya khalu rakṣasām

original: samitrabandhuḥ sāmātyaḥ sabalaḥ saparicchadaḥ /
analyzed: sa mitra bandhuḥ sa amātyaḥ sa balaḥ sa paricchadaḥ

original: viṣapānaṃ pibasy etat pipāsita ivodakam // Ram_3,49.20 //
analyzed: viṣa pānam pibasi etat pipāsitaḥ iva udakam

original: anubandham ajānantaḥ karmaṇām avicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: anubandham a jānantaḥ karmaṇām a vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,49.21 //
analyzed: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvam vinaśiṣyasi

original: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase /
analyzed: baddhaḥ tvam kāla pāśena kva gataḥ tasya mokṣyase

original: vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā // Ram_3,49.22 //
analyzed: vadhāya baḍiśam gṛhya sa āmiṣam jalajaḥ yathā

original: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa /
analyzed: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa

original: dharṣaṇaṃ cāśramasyāsya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau // Ram_3,49.23 //
analyzed: dharṣaṇam ca āśramasya asya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau

original: yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam /
analyzed: yathā tvayā kṛtam karma bhīruṇā loka garhitam

original: taskarācarito mārgo naiṣa vīraniṣevitaḥ // Ram_3,49.24 //
analyzed: taskara ācaritaḥ mārgaḥ na eṣa vīra niṣevitaḥ

original: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa /
analyzed: yudhyasva yadi śūraḥ si muhūrtam tiṣṭha rāvaṇa

original: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā // Ram_3,49.25 //
analyzed: śayiṣyase hataḥ bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharaḥ tathā

original: paretakāle puruṣo yat karma pratipadyate /
analyzed: pareta kāle puruṣaḥ yat karma pratipadyate

original: vināśāyātmano 'dharmyaṃ pratipanno 'si karma tat // Ram_3,49.26 //
analyzed: vināśāya ātmanaḥ dharmyam pratipannaḥ u si karma tat

original: pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān /
analyzed: pāpa anubandhaḥ vai yasya karmaṇaḥ kaḥ nu tat pumān

original: kurvīta lokādhipatiḥ svayambhūr bhagavān api // Ram_3,49.27 //
analyzed: kurvīta loka adhipatiḥ svayambhūḥ bhagavān api

original: evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā śubham vākyam jaṭāyuḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: nipapāta bhṛśaṃ pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān // Ram_3,49.28 //
analyzed: nipapāta bhṛśam pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān

original: taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ /
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā nakhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ virarāda samantataḥ

original: adhirūḍho gajāroho yathā syād duṣṭavāraṇam // Ram_3,49.29 //
analyzed: adhirūḍhaḥ gaja ārohaḥ yathā syāt duṣṭa vāraṇam

original: virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan /
analyzed: virarāda nakhaiḥ asya tuṇḍam pṛṣṭhe samarpayan

original: keśāṃś cotpāṭayāmāsa nakhapakṣamukhāyudhaḥ // Ram_3,49.30 //
analyzed: keśān ca utpāṭayāmāsa nakha pakṣa mukha āyudhaḥ

original: sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ /
analyzed: sa tathā gṛdhra rājena kliśyamānaḥ muhur muhur

original: amarṣasphuritauṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,49.31 //
analyzed: amarṣa sphurita oṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ

original: sampariṣvajya vaidehīṃ vāmenāṅkena rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sampariṣvajya vaidehīm vāmena aṅkena rāvaṇaḥ

original: talenābhijaghānārto jaṭāyuṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ // Ram_3,49.32 //
analyzed: talena abhijaghāna ārtaḥ jaṭāyum krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: jaṭāyus tam atikramya tuṇḍenāsya kharādhipaḥ /
analyzed: jaṭāyuḥ tam atikramya tuṇḍena asya khara adhipaḥ

original: vāmabāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharad ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,49.33 //
analyzed: vāma bāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharat ariṃdamaḥ

original: tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān /
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ daśagrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān

original: muṣṭibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat // Ram_3,49.34 //
analyzed: muṣṭibhyām caraṇābhyām ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat

original: tato muhūrtaṃ saṃgrāmo babhūvātulavīryayoḥ /
analyzed: tatas muhūrtam saṃgrāmaḥ babhūva atula vīryayoḥ

original: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca // Ram_3,49.35 //
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇām pravarasya ca

original: tasya vyāyacchamānasya rāmasyārthe 'tha rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasya vyāyacchamānasya rāmasya arthe rāvaṇaḥ

original: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya socchinat // Ram_3,49.36 //
analyzed: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya sa ucchinat

original: sa chinnapakṣaḥ sahasā rakṣasā raudrakarmaṇā /
analyzed: sa chinna pakṣaḥ sahasā rakṣasā raudra karmaṇā

original: nipapāta hato gṛdhro dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ // Ram_3,49.37 //
analyzed: nipapāta hataḥ gṛdhraḥ dharaṇyām alpa jīvitaḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā patitam bhūmau kṣataja ārdram jaṭāyuṣam

original: abhyadhāvata vaidehī svabandhum iva duḥkhitā // Ram_3,49.38 //
analyzed: abhyadhāvata vaidehī sva bandhum iva duḥkhitā

original: taṃ nīlajīmūtanikāśakalpaṃ supāṇḍuroraskam udāravīryam /
analyzed: tam nīla jīmūta nikāśa kalpam su pāṇḍura uraskam udāra vīryam

original: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam // Ram_3,49.39 //
analyzed: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyām jaṭāyuṣam śāntam iva agni dāvam

original: tatas tu taṃ pattrarathaṃ mahītale nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam /
analyzed: tatas tu tam pattraratham mahī tale nipātitam rāvaṇa vega marditam

original: punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā // Ram_3,49.40 //
analyzed: punar pariṣvajya śaśi prabhā ānanā ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā

original: tam alpajīvitaṃ bhūmau sphurantaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ /
analyzed: tam alpa jīvitam bhūmau sphurantam rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: dadarśa gṛdhraṃ patitaṃ samīpe rāghavāśramāt // Ram_3,50.1 //
analyzed: dadarśa gṛdhram patitam samīpe rāghava āśramāt

original: sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam /
analyzed: sā tu tārādhipa mukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam

original: gṛdhrarājaṃ vinihataṃ vilalāpa suduḥkhitā // Ram_3,50.2 //
analyzed: gṛdhra rājam vinihatam vilalāpa su duḥkhitā

original: nimittaṃ lakṣaṇajñānaṃ śakunisvaradarśanam /
analyzed: nimittam lakṣaṇa jñānam śakuni svara darśanam

original: avaśyaṃ sukhaduḥkheṣu narāṇāṃ pratidṛśyate // Ram_3,50.3 //
analyzed: avaśyam sukha duḥkheṣu narāṇām pratidṛśyate

original: na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na nūnam rāma jānāsi mahat vyasanam ātmanaḥ

original: dhāvanti nūnaṃ kākutstha madarthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.4 //
analyzed: dhāvanti nūnam kākutstha mad artham mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā /
analyzed: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇa iti vara aṅganā

original: susaṃtrastā samākrandac chṛṇvatāṃ tu yathāntike // Ram_3,50.5 //
analyzed: su saṃtrastā samākrandat śṛṇvatām tu yathā antike

original: tāṃ kliṣṭamālyābharaṇāṃ vilapantīm anāthavat /
analyzed: tām kliṣṭa mālya ābharaṇām vilapantīm anātha vat

original: abhyadhāvata vaidehīṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,50.6 //
analyzed: abhyadhāvata vaidehīm rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān /
analyzed: tām latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīm mahā drumān

original: muñca muñceti bahuśaḥ pravadan rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,50.7 //
analyzed: muñca muñca iti bahuśas pravadan rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane /
analyzed: krośantīm rāma rāma iti rāmeṇa rahitām vane

original: jīvitāntāya keśeṣu jagrāhāntakasaṃnibhaḥ // Ram_3,50.8 //
analyzed: jīvitāntāya keśeṣu jagrāha antaka saṃnibhaḥ

original: pradharṣitāyāṃ vaidehyāṃ babhūva sacarācaram /
analyzed: pradharṣitāyām vaidehyām babhūva sacarācaram

original: jagat sarvam amaryādaṃ tamasāndhena saṃvṛtam // Ram_3,50.9 //
analyzed: jagat sarvam amaryādam tamasā andhena saṃvṛtam

original: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sītām parāmṛṣṭām dīnām divyena cakṣuṣā

original: kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ // Ram_3,50.10 //
analyzed: kṛtam kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ

original: prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ /
analyzed: prahṛṣṭāḥ vyathitāḥ ca āsan sarve te parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinaḥ // Ram_3,50.11 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sītām parāmṛṣṭām daṇḍaka araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca /
analyzed: sa tu tām rāma rāma iti rudantīm lakṣmaṇa iti ca

original: jagāmākāśam ādāya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,50.12 //
analyzed: jagāma ākāśam ādāya rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: taptābharaṇasarvāṅgī pītakauśeyavāsanī /
analyzed: tapta ābharaṇa sarva aṅgī pīta kauśeya vāsanī

original: rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā // Ram_3,50.13 //
analyzed: rarāja rāja putrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā

original: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ

original: adhikaṃ paribabhrāja girir dīpta ivāgninā // Ram_3,50.14 //
analyzed: adhikam paribabhrāja giriḥ dīptaḥ iva agninā

original: tasyāḥ paramakalyāṇyās tāmrāṇi surabhīṇi ca /
analyzed: tasyāḥ parama kalyāṇyāḥ tāmrāṇi surabhīṇi ca

original: padmapattrāṇi vaidehyā abhyakīryanta rāvaṇam // Ram_3,50.15 //
analyzed: padma pattrāṇi vaidehyāḥ abhyakīryanta rāvaṇam

original: tasyāḥ kauśeyam uddhūtam ākāśe kanakaprabham /
analyzed: tasyāḥ kauśeyam uddhūtam ākāśe kanaka prabham

original: babhau cādityarāgeṇa tāmram abhram ivātape // Ram_3,50.16 //
analyzed: babhau ca āditya rāgeṇa tāmram abhram iva ātape

original: tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam /
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vimalam vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇa aṅka gam

original: na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam // Ram_3,50.17 //
analyzed: na rarāja vinā rāmam vinālam iva paṅkajam

original: babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ /
analyzed: babhūva jaladam nīlam bhittvā candraḥ iva uditaḥ

original: sulalāṭaṃ sukeśāntaṃ padmagarbhābham avraṇam /
analyzed: su lalāṭam su keśāntam padmagarbha ābham avraṇam

original: śuklaiḥ suvimalair dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhir alaṃkṛtam // Ram_3,50.18 //
analyzed: śuklaiḥ su vimalaiḥ dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhiḥ alaṃkṛtam

original: ruditaṃ vyapamṛṣṭāsraṃ candravat priyadarśanam /
analyzed: ruditam vyapamṛṣṭa asram candra vat priya darśanam

original: sunāsaṃ cārutāmrauṣṭham ākāśe hāṭakaprabham // Ram_3,50.19 //
analyzed: su nāsam cāru tāmra oṣṭham ākāśe hāṭaka prabham

original: rākṣasendrasamādhūtaṃ tasyās tad vacanaṃ śubham /

analyzed: tatra iyam rakṣyatām gūḍham yuṣmābhiḥ parivāritā

analyzed: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇam roma harṣaṇam

analyzed: gṛhītvā ca karam savyam lakṣmaṇam raghunandanaḥ

analyzed: uvāca madhura udarkam idam paruṣam ārta vat

analyzed: asaṃśayam lakṣmaṇa nā asti sītā hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā

analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam dīnam śūnye daśaratha ātmajaḥ

analyzed: paryapṛcchata dharma ātmā vaidehīm āgatam vinā

analyzed: prasthitam daṇḍaka araṇyam yā mām anujagāma ha

analyzed: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yām hitvā tvam iha āgataḥ

analyzed: rājya bhraṣṭasya dīnasya daṇḍakān paridhāvataḥ

analyzed: kva sā prāṇa sahāyā me sītā sura sutā upamā

analyzed: pati tvam amarāṇām vā pṛthivyāḥ ca api lakṣmaṇa

original: vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,56.5 //
analyzed: vinā tām tapanīya ābhām nā iccheyam janakātmajām

analyzed: kaccit pravrājanam saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati

original: sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi /
analyzed: sītā nimittam saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi

analyzed: guhāḥ ca vividhāḥ ghorāḥ nalinīḥ pārvatīḥ ca ha

analyzed: tatas samutsādaya hema puṅkhaiḥ mahā indra vajra pratimaiḥ śara oghaiḥ
